description: What is your strategy to go beyond user acquisition? In this talk Paul Cutsinger, Developer Evangelist at Amazon Appstore, provides a high level introduction to evolving your players into fans. A game with fans has deeper engagement, more new players, greater revenue opportunities, and more exciting content. We will discuss all the new opportunities a fan base generates and best practices for creating your own. This course is for beginners and intermediate level mobile app developers. Some concepts and methods outlined may be valuable to experienced developers as well. We will dive deeper into each of the topics covered in subsequent courses.
title: Turn Your Players Into Fans & Build a Thriving App Business
